thread.title: Steve Harvey Tells Warren Beatty To Give Him A Call After Oscar Flub
thread.title_full: Steve Harvey Tells Warren Beatty To Give Him A Call After Oscar Flub

author: Cavan Sieczkowski
title: Steve Harvey Tells Warren Beatty To Give Him A Call After Oscar Flub
text:
Steve Harvey Tells Warren Beatty To Give Him A Call After Oscar Flub "YOU KNOW I have something to say 😂 " By Cavan Sieczkowski 
Steve Harvey knows a thing or two about mistakes at live awards shows. 
The comedian tweeted Monday morning that Warren Beatty should give him a call after the actor and Faye Dunaway mistakenly presented “La La Land” with the Best Picture award on Sunday, even though “Moonlight” was the actual winner. 
“I opened the envelope and it said, ‘Emma Stone, ‘La La Land,’’” Beatty said onstage after realizing that he had the incorrect envelope. “That’s why I took such a long look at Faye and at you ― I wasn’t trying to be funny ... This is ‘Moonlight,’ the Best Picture.” 
Back in 2015, Harvey mistakenly crowned the wrong Miss Universe during the live pageant. Good morning everybody! Went to sleep early last night. So... what I miss? #Oscars — Steve Harvey (@IAmSteveHarvey) February 27, 2017 Tune in to @SteveHarveyFM at 8 AM ET today for my response to last night's #Oscars . YOU KNOW I have something to say 😂 — Steve Harvey (@IAmSteveHarvey) February 27, 2017 Call me Warren Beatty. I can help you get through this! #Oscars — Steve Harvey (@IAmSteveHarvey) February 27, 2017 
The humor of the moment was not lost on social media. Comparisons to Harvey were made. Laughs were had. "Nobody can f*** up an awards show again, right?"-Steve Harvey"Hold my beer." - #Oscars Staff — Josh Macuga (@JoshMacuga) February 27, 2017 Steve Harvey sitting at the crib like...
